casebody.data:
Jaime FRIEDMAN, et al., Plaintiffs-Respondents,
and
Ellen Arendt, et al., Plaintiffs-Respondents,
v.
Teodoro MARTINEZ, Defendant,
and
I&G Garden State, LLC, Jones Lang LaSalle, Inc.,
and
LaSalle Investment Management, Inc., Defendants-Petitioners,
and
CRS Facility Services, LLC, Defendant/Third-Party Plaintiff,
v.
Ruben Sabillon, Jamar Sailor,
and
Planned Security Services, Inc., Third-Party Defendants,
and
Planned Companies d/b/a Planned Building Services, Inc., et al., Third-Party Defendants. C-38 September Term 2018
081093 Supreme Court of New Jersey. January 11, 2019

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-004896-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is granted.
